data.title: Sporting Kansas City live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Sporting Kansas City live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Sporting Kansas City live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Sporting Kansas City next match

Sporting Kansas City will play the next match against Columbus Crew on Aug 9, 2024, 11:30:00 PM UTC in Leagues Cup.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Columbus Crew vs Sporting Kansas City live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Sporting Kansas City matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Sporting Kansas City previous match

Sporting Kansas City previous match was against CD Toluca in Leagues Cup, the match ended with result 2 - 1 (CD Toluca won the match).

Sporting Kansas City fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Sporting Kansas City scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Sporting Kansas City performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Sporting Kansas City matches.

Current Sporting Kansas City players

Forward: Dániel Sallói, Alan Pulido, Johnny Russell, William Agada, Alenis Vargas, Khiry Shelton, Stephen Afrifa Midfielder: Nemanja Radoja, Erik Thommy, Felipe Hernández, Rémi Walter, Memo Rodríguez, Danny Flores, Sebastian Cruz, Macielo Tschantret Defender: Logan Ndenbe, Andreu Fontàs, Daniel Rosero Valencia, Tim Leibold, Zorhan Bassong, Kayden Pierre, Robert Voloder, Jacob Davis, Robert Castellanos Goalkeeper: John Pulskamp, Timothy Melia

The current Sporting Kansas City roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Sporting Kansas City top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
